label: Behavior 01479279
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving southward with a slight westerly drift, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 55.51589 - 0.0232 × t, lon(t) ≈ 4.410537 - 0.0001 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
